question:
Which among the following about the Government of India Act of 1935 are correct?
1. Establishment of Federal Court was recommended
2. India Council of the Secretary of State was abolished
3. Responsible government in provinces were introduced
4. Establishment of Reserve Bank of India was recommended
Choose the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: The Government of India Act had 321 sections and 10 Schedules. It recommended for establishment of the Federal Court (Which was established in 1937). India Council of the Secretary of State was abolished. Responsible government in provinces were introduced. Establishment of Reserve Bank of India was recommended to control the financial matters of India. RBI was established in 1935.
